column5: When we were up at Bying Inlet last year I noticed guys trolling for musky and they had there poles in holders and the tips of the poles were in the water as they trolled, any one know why?

Alot of Muskie guys do it. The main reason is to catch floating weeds on the rod tips instead of them sliding down the line and fowling the lures. It will also aid in getting the lure alittle bit deeper!
